definition: a whole lifetime (idiom); all my life
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
surname Shi
life/age/generation/era/world/lifetime/epoch/descendant/noble

sentences.english: Apple has an iPod customer for life.
sentences.chinese: 苹果拥有iPod用户的一生一世。

sentences.english: Hook finger hurts you for my whole life, put on wedding you is my bride.
sentences.chinese: 勾勾手指疼你一生一世，穿上婚纱你就是我的新娘。

sentences.english: Recently, I met those guys I hoped for being my couple in my life again.
sentences.chinese: 最近，我重遇那些我曾渴求与他们一生一世的人。

sentences.english: With this time of life, for you to find all moved.
sentences.chinese: 用这一生一世的时间，为你寻找所有的感动。

sentences.english: All through my life I have relived that very first day.
sentences.chinese: 这一生一世，我不断回味着初相遇的那一天。

sentences.english: This is from cradle to the grave one a life time.
Our whole life, not less of a tolerance and love this.
sentences.chinese: 我们的一生一世，不可少了这一份宽容和爱心。

sentences.english: He will give me cradle-to-grave protection.
To love you for life, song weiyang.
sentences.chinese: 三生有幸爱上你，一生一世曲未央。

sentences.english: Beside my ear, you give me your promise of life.
sentences.chinese: 在我的耳边，你许下一生一世的承诺。

sentences.english: These doggies are waiting for a good home.
sentences.chinese: 您可以给狗儿一个一生一世的家吗？

sentences.english: 40 so that they will fear you all the time they live in the land you gave our fathers.
sentences.chinese: 使他们在你赐给我们列祖之地上一生一世敬畏你。

sentences.english: I have forgotten about our decade's staying, and then I am determined to start a lifelong one with the other man.
sentences.chinese: 我忘却十年的盟誓，向另一个人许下一生一世的誓言。

sentences.english: The pronunciation of 1314 is similar to 'for ever.
sentences.chinese: 而1314的发音则和“一生一世”相似。

sentences.english: that if I followed you, you would walk with me always.
sentences.chinese: 当我立志跟从您，您便一生一世与我同行。

sentences.english: Real Fans will support Davichi in their life time!
sentences.chinese: 真正歌迷对你们的支持，是一生一世的。

definition: enduring while the world lasts (idiom)/eternal
for ever and ever
to stay together/to rely on one another
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
this life
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
lit. when the seas run dry and the stones go soft (idiom)/fig. forever/until the end of time
from dawn to dusk/all the time
(for) a lifetime
faithful unto death (i.e. Confucian ban on widow remarrying)
unswerving in one's loyalty (idiom); faithful and constant
see 天荒地老[tian1 huang1 di4 lao3]
to love each other
to stand by (sb) (idiom)/steadfast loyalty
to pledge undying love (idiom); oath of eternal love/to swear by all the Gods
to love dearly
